Package jadex.testcases.goals

This package contains testcases related to goals.

See:
          Description

Capabilities
AbstractQueryGoal Test abstract query goal dispatched by inner capability.
GoalReferenceParameterSet Test if goal references can have paraemter sets.
InnerAbstractGoal Test abstract goal dispatched by inner capability.
OuterAbstractGoal Test abstract goal dispatched from outer capability.
 

Agents
AbstractQueryGoal Test abstract query goal dispatched by inner capability.
AchieveGoal Test an achieve goal with context condition for goal suspension.
Candy An agent that uses two subsequent plans for achieving the goal of eating candy Example clarifies problem from Brad Dixon's post on 07/27/05.
DropGoal Test waiting for a dropped goal.
GoalBindings Test the creation of goals with binding parameters.
GoalConditions Test the creation, context, and drop conditions of goals.
GoalFinishedTrigger Test if a plan can react on a goal finished event.
GoalInhibition Test goal inhibition.
GoalRecur Test a goal recur.
GoalReferenceParameterSet Test if goal references can have paraemter sets.
GoalRegressionTest Test different behaviours of goals.
InnerAbstractGoal Test abstract goal dispatched by inner capability.
MaintainGoalContext Test maintain goal suspension.
OuterAbstractGoal Test abstract goal dispatched from outer capability.
ParameterSet Tests if the parameter sets of goals work.
QueryGoal Test a query goal.
SubgoalHandling Test subgoal handling in standard plans.
SubgoalHandlingMobile Test subgoal handling in mobile plans.
TriggerBySuspension Test if goal suspension can trigger a plan.
UniqueGoal Testing uniqueness properties of goals.
 

Package jadex.testcases.goals Description

This package contains testcases related to goals.
